#Walmartmoms #4 w @MargieOmero - WMoms are unique slice of electorate. Tend to be more GOP, more cons, more church going/evangel, more AA.
#walmartmoms #3 w @MargieOmero - WMoms believe things are stacked against "people like me" in the country - 58%-39%. (All women - 48%/48%)
#Walmartmoms - #2 w @MargieOmero - WM voted for GOP Cong candidate by 52%-46%, compared to DEM margin among all women - 51%-47%.
.@MargieOmero and I completed a post-elect poll last night w/ #walmartmoms. #1 - WMoms voted Trump 48%-44%. They voted Obama '12 51%-47%.

@Hub_heel Focus group in Charlotte.
#walmartmoms What concerns about HRC as President: other countries won't take female seriously (others agree it's a valid point).
#walmartmoms reaction to Pres Trump: move back to Mexico, OMG, aw shit, we'll have more jobs, money, not pretty but safe, moving to Italy.
#walmartmoms - Reaction to "President Hillary Clinton": Finally a woman, corrupt and unsafe, uncertain, frustration/uncertainty, family...
#walmartmoms - heard nothing re where Richard Burr stands on Donald Trump.
#walmartmoms - Three ticket-splitters here, but they're all Trump/Ross voters.
#walmartmoms - The Senate race - about half say they are paying little attention.
#walmartmoms just six of ten knew the name of their favorite VP candidate.
#walmartmoms - Few consider him as the leader of the GOP. Used the GOP as a way to run for President.
#walmartmoms If Trump loses - "demands a recount, declares fraud, embarrassed, cry-baby, temper tantrum, won't concede."
#walmartmoms Trump could have won, but "he lost his integrity." "Making fun of people." "Should have stuck to issues." "Release taxes."
#walmartmoms Most agree that Trump "COULD" have won this election. But, "he opened his mouth." "Disrespect for women." "Cocky attitude."
#walmartmoms - No one in this group really believes this is a "rigged election" - contrast to the Las Vegas group.
